title: DevOps Culture: Building Better Software Delivery Pipelines

sections.title: DevOps in Practice
sections.markdown: How to foster a DevOps culture in your organization and implement CI/CD pipelines that accelerate development while maintaining quality.

sections.title: DevOps Table
sections.markdown:
### Pipeline Stages

| Stage      | Tool        | Purpose         |
|------------|------------|-----------------|
| Build      | Jenkins    | Compile code    |
| Test       | Jest       | Ensure quality  |
| Deploy     | Docker     | Release         |

![DevOps](https://deifkwefumgah.cloudfront.net/shadcnblocks/block/placeholder-dark-2.svg)

sections.title: Sample Code & Resources
sections.markdown:
#### Example: GitHub Actions

```yaml
name: CI
on: [push]
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: Run tests
        run: npm test
```

- [GitHub Actions Docs](https://docs.github.com/en/actions)
